body: # Summary On the Haswell front-end nodes on the LANL machine Darwin, Spack LLVM builds fail. They crash in the `build` phase with the error: ``` make: *** No rule to make target `install-LLVMDemangle'. Stop. ``` Affected versions: 3.9.1, 3.9.0, 3.8.1, 3.8.0, 3.7.1, 3.7.0, 3.6.2 ### Expected Result Successful builds of `llvm`. ### Actual Result ``` dantopa@darwin-fe1.lanl.gov:spack.haswell-0.11.1 $ spack -d install -v llvm @ 3.9.1 % gcc @ 4.8.5 ... ==> Installing llvm ... ==> Executing phase: 'build' ... ==> 'make' '-j4' 'install-LLVMDemangle' make: *** No rule to make target `install-LLVMDemangle'. Stop. ==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2: 'make' '-j4' 'install-LLVMDemangle' 1 error found in build log: [ ... ] 814 make[3]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/dantopa/spack-stage/spack-stage-1rwaLK/llvm-3.9.1.src/spack-build' 815 Built target install-LLVMTableGen 816 make[2]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/dantopa/spack-stage/spack-stage-1rwaLK/llvm-3.9.1.src/spack-build' 817 /projects/draco/vendors/spack.haswell-0.11.1/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/cmake-3.9.4-bu52ivolymhkd7sre3esigctauuxcljq/bin/cmake -E cmake_progress_start /tmp/dantopa/spack-stage/spack-stage-1rwaLK/llvm-3.9.1.src/spack-build/CMakeFiles 0 818 make[1]: Leaving directory `/ram/tmp/dantopa/spack-stage/spack-stage-1rwaLK/llvm-3.9.1.src/spack-build' 819 ==> 'make' '-j4' 'install-LLVMDemangle' >> 820 make: *** No rule to make target `install-LLVMDemangle'. Stop. ``` ### Steps to reproduce the issue ```console $ spack install llvm @ 3.9.1 % gcc @ 4.8.5 ... ``` ### Information on your system ``` dantopa@darwin-fe1.lanl.gov:spack.haswell-0.11.1 $ spack arch linux-centos7-x86_64 dantopa@darwin-fe1.lanl.gov:spack.haswell-0.11.1 $ uname -a Linux darwin-fe1.lanl.gov 4.14.12-1.el7.elrepo.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Jan 5 13:28:56 EST 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux dantopa@darwin-fe1.lanl.gov:spack.haswell-0.11.1 $ date Thu Feb 15 13:49:35 MST 2018 ``` `log` files: [spack-cc-llvm-vynyec2.in.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729323/spack-cc-llvm-vynyec2.in.log) [spack-cc-llvm-vynyec2.out.log](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729324/spack-cc-llvm-vynyec2.out.log) `*.yaml` files: [config.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729337/config.yaml.txt) [mirrors.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729338/mirrors.yaml.txt) [modules.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729339/modules.yaml.txt) [packages.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729340/packages.yaml.txt) `build` files: [spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729344/spack-build.env.txt) [spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/1729345/spack-build.out.txt)
